summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: For Pro Blue Mini Foam Boards 220/320 Grit, 50 Count Review Date: 2016/04/28 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '8.7 x 3.5 x 0.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '796433239741 672047114103'} Review Text: Finally files that I can actually use on my frail nails without tearing them up! I used to like Sally hansen nail files, but can no longer find these anymore. I believe they were a softer grit emery board as these are. I'm very happy to finally have found the fine grit that I need for my thin nails. I personally like that these come individually wrapped so that I can store one in every bag without damaging anything around them! Review Title: Finally files that I can actually use on my weak nails without tearing them up! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: TEEMI Crystal Flower Hair Barrette for thick hair Wedding Pearl Hair clips Pins for women (#87) Review Date: 2018/03/10 Store: TEEMI Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TEEMI', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Pearl, Metal', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.91 x 5.12 x 0.79 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} Review Text: This really is not for very thick hair. The barrette clip itself is only 2 1/4" wide. The clip is pretty though, but unfortunately will not work for my mother as there is no way this would hold all of her hair. Review Title: Will not hold very thick hair. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: NYKKOLA Minimalist Dainty Pearl Marquise Triangle Rhombus Infinity Gold Geometric Hairpin Hair Clip Clamps Accessories Barrettes Bobby Pin Statement Ornament Women's Headwear Styling Jewelry Review Date: 2018/03/13 Store: NYKKOLA Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NYKKOLA', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Minimal', 'Embellishment': 'Pearl', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.1 x 3.6 x 0.4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'IL-741', 'UPC': '759894286709'} Review Text: These would be cute, and functional for me if A LOT smaller. These will not hold my fine hair at all - they are HUGE. Review Title: Not for fine hair... Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: JASON Vitamin E 5,000 IU All Over Body Nourishment Oil, 4 oz. (Packaging May Vary) Review Date: 2020/11/26 Store: JASON Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'JASON', 'Scent': 'Almond,Apricot', 'Item Form': 'Oil,Liquid', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin E', 'Unit Count': '4.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 1.97 x 1.73 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '078522050018', 'Manufacturer': 'Jason Natural Products'} Review Text: This is predominately Sunflower seed oil and Safflower oil - ie. CHEAP COOKING oils! I'm thankful Amazon refunded this, as I expected a bottle of vitamin E oil, not cooking oils with a little bit of vit e and other stuff. Review Title: NOT what the label says! Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals Review Date: 2020/12/22 Store: Pure Body Naturals Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'} Review Text: The previous Pure Body Naturals Pure Gloss Smoothing Shampoo was AMAZING. This new version leaves my hair stringy and dry!

See the difference in ingredients in my photo! The previous formula had argan oil as the second ingredient!

I am soo sad they discontinued this amazing shampoo and replaced it with such a terrible product! Review Title: NEW formula is TERRIBLE!!!!! ALL good reviews are from the AMAZING previous version!!!! Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: VAV 2 In 1 Mini Travel Hair Straightener And Curler Ceramic Tourmaline Coated Barrel Flat Iron Dual Voltage Rose Gold Review Date: 2021/12/26 Store: VAV(Vivid&Vogue) Average Rating: 2.9 Product Details: {'Shape': 'Flat, Barrel', 'Brand': 'VAV(Vivid&Vogue)', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic Tourmaline', 'Color': 'Gold', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.8 x 10.6 x 2.3 inches; 10.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '761710039635'} Review Text: I use this at home and when traveling. I have mid length (my hair reaches mid back) very fine hair. This is by far the best hair curler ever! It's short enough that I don't burn myself! I rarely use the flattener position. I wish I could buy a backup of this fantastic little tool! It's compact for traveling, and the perfect size heating element for fine hair! Review Title: The best hair curler ever for fine hair! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a distinct preference for products tailored to specific hair types and nail care needs, particularly favoring items that accommodate delicate or fine textures. The sentiment towards hair accessories varies, with consistent feedback indicating dissatisfaction with the fit and functionality for their fine hair. Products rated highly are those that align with their requirements and perform optimally for their particular hair and nail conditions.

Quality is a prominent factor in their decision-making, as they express disappointment with items that did not meet expectations, especially when the products are misrepresented. This is evident in reviews where they highlight the inadequacy of premium claims for hair care products and their reaction to changes in formulation.

Additionally, while there is some acknowledgment of price sensitivity, the focus seems to align more closely with quality and effectiveness rather than cost alone. Overall, the person's core preferences center on finding reliable, effective products designed for finer hair and nails, valuing quality over price, and expressing frustration with misleading claims or inadequate product performance.

target_interaction.title: Love this deodorant
target_interaction.text: I much appreciate French deodorants. I do not understand why do many in the US smell like baby powder-YUCK! this has a pleasant feminine scent and  keeps my underarms dry all day. I also love that it's alcohol free and doesn't sting when applying straight after shaving in the shower.
target_interaction.title_meta: Déodorant Femme Bille Soin Polynésie Huile De Monoï & Fleur De Tiaré Efficacité 24h - 50 ml - Pack of 3
